charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F, 21:846=CD.F COnspire to possess with intent to distribute a quantity of methamphetamine

21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - defendant did combine, conspire, confederate, and agree together with each other, and with others known and unknown to the Grand Jury, to intentionally and knowingly distribute and possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance, which offense involved actual methamphetamine and / or a  mixture and substance containing methamphetamine, Schedule II Controlled Substances, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Section 84l(a)(1).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: On February 10, 2016 defendant was sentenced to 87 months, 5 years supervised release, and $100 special assessment fee.
